com.epam.services.dto.UserDTO

Packages that use UserDTO
Package
Description
com.epam.services
 
com.epam.services.impl
 

  • Uses of UserDTO in com.epam.services

    Methods in com.epam.services that return UserDTO
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    UserDTO
    UserService.getUserById(int userId)
    This method returns the user with a specific id.
    UserDTO
    UserService.login(String login, String password)
    Verifies the user's credentials and returns the UserDTO of the user if the user exists.
    Methods in com.epam.services that return types with arguments of type UserDTO
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<UserDTO>
    UserService.getAllSubscribers()
    Returns all subscribers from the persistent layer.
    List<UserDTO>
    UserService.getAllUnblockedSubscribers()
    Returns all unblocked subscribers from the persistent layer.
    List<UserDTO>
    UserService.getSubscriberForCharging()
    Returns all unblocked subscribers from the persistent layer with tariffs that have 0 days until next payment.
    List<UserDTO>
    UserService.viewSubscribers(String searchField, int page, int entriesPerPage)
    Returns a filtered and sorted list of UserDTO based on the specified parameters.

  • Uses of UserDTO in com.epam.services.impl

    Methods in com.epam.services.impl that return UserDTO
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    UserDTO
    UserServiceImpl.getUserById(int userId)
    This method return UserDTO form from the persistent layer for specific user id.
    UserDTO
    UserServiceImpl.login(String login, String password)
    This method takes a credential and checks if a user with those credentials exists, if so returns a UserDTo for that user.
    Methods in com.epam.services.impl that return types with arguments of type UserDTO
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<UserDTO>
    UserServiceImpl.getAllSubscribers()
    This method returns all subscribers from the persistent layer.
    List<UserDTO>
    UserServiceImpl.getAllUnblockedSubscribers()
    This method returns all subscribers from the persistent layer that has unblocked status.
    List<UserDTO>
    UserServiceImpl.getSubscriberForCharging()
    This method returns all subscribers from the persistent layer that has unblocked status and has tariffs with days until next payment equals to 0.
    List<UserDTO>
    UserServiceImpl.viewSubscribers(String searchField, int page, int entriesPerPage)
    This method return filtered and sorted by some parameters list of UserDTO.
